entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F1 on `global` keyword of a `global using` directive opens the wrong help page #68009
  • F1 on `using static` directive doesn't open the correct help page #68008
  • Using the VB.NET NameOf operator with an event name doesn't work unless used within the same class #68004
  • Pressing F1 on VB.NET operator NameOf goes to the wrong page #68003
  • Getting address to a managed `ref` field returns the value of the field, not the address #68000
  • Checksum's usage of a native hash algorithm resulting in thread starvation #67995

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33627.224 #68012
  • Consider avoiding irreducible loops in async codegen #67774
  • VS2022 TODO items in Task List not being updated #68001

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert bad expressions for error recovery #68011
    Area-Compilers
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • .editorconfig should only show as dirty when changed #68007
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create file based on project path if the file path is null in LSP code action handler #68006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Filter out EnableNullable code actions #68005
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Incremental Generators documentation fix #68002
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use optimized hash creation methods on .NET 5+ #67999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup/perf in creating member maps. #67997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • EnC refactoring: Align wrappers with contracts better #67967
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` in source build #67996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Avoid accessing DocData prior to document initialization #67978
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid retaining memory while waiting for changes #67982
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add interceptors open design questions #67970
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Interceptors: address duplicate interceptions feedback, handle nameof, add test coverage #67971
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Clarify that setting to use .NET SDK preview only exists in non-preview Visual Studio #64514
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
